eu.smartdatalake.simsearch

Class SearchHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.SearchHandler

  • public class SearchHandler
extends Object
    Handles a new multi-attribute similarity search request. A new instance of this class is invoked by the coordinator.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SearchHandler

        public SearchHandler(Map<String,DataSource> dataSources,
                     Map<String,DatasetIdentifier> datasetIdentifiers,
                     Map<String,HashMap<?,?>> datasets,
                     Map<String,Index> indices,
                     Map<String,INormal> normalizations,
                     Logger log)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        dataSources - Dictionary of the available data sources.
        datasetIdentifiers - Dictionary of the attributes available for similarity search operations.
        datasets - Dictionary of the attribute datasets available for querying.
        indices - Dictionary of in-memory indices on attribute data built for similarity search operations.
        normalizations - Dictionary of normalizations applicable to numerical attribute data.
        log - Handle to the log file for notifications and execution statistics.

    • Method Detail

      • findIdentifier

        private DatasetIdentifier findIdentifier(String column)
        Finds the internal identifier used for the data of a given attribute.
        Parameters:
        column - The name of the attribute.
        Returns:
        The dataset identifier.

      • getMaxNumValue

        private Double getMaxNumValue(JdbcConnector dbConnector,
                              HttpConnector httpConnector,
                              DatasetIdentifier id)
        Provides the maximum value available in a numerical attribute.
        Parameters:
        dbConnector - The JDBC connection specification to a DBMS (if applicable).
        httpConnector - The HTTP connection specification for accessing REST APIs (if applicable).
        id - The identifier of the attribute in a dataset.
        Returns:
        The maximum numerical value available in the specified attribute.

      • getExactScoreRandomAccess

        private double getExactScoreRandomAccess(String id,
                                         int w)
        Calculates the exact similarity score for a given entity with random access to the underlying datasets.
        Parameters:
        id - The entity identifier.
        w - The identifier of the weight combination to be applied on the scores.
        Returns:
        The exact aggregated score based on all attribute values.

      • search

        public SearchResponse[] search(SearchRequest params)
        Given a user-specified JSON configuration, execute the various similarity search queries and provide the ranked aggregated results.
        Parameters:
        params - JSON configuration that provides the multi-facet query specifications.
        Returns:
        A JSON-formatted response with the ranked results.
